application.name: csminit
application.brief: Load a CSM model and run imageToGround at a specified pixel.

description.p: This program loads the CSM model that has been attached to a cube via csminit and then runs imageToGround to generate a ground point at a specified pixel.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.brief: The input cube that has a CSM model attached.
parameter.description: The input cube that has a CSM model attached.

parameter.name: SAMPLE
parameter.brief: The sample to run imageToGround on.
parameter.description: The sample to run imageToGround on. If not specified then the center sample of the image will be used.

parameter.name: LINE
parameter.brief: The line to run imageToGround on.
parameter.description: The line to run imageToGround on. If not specified then the center line of the image will be used.

parameter.name: HEIGHT
parameter.brief: The height above the ellipsoid to intersect at.
parameter.description: The height above the ellipsoid to intersect at. If not specified then the ellipsoid will be intersected directly.
